document_data.name: Grimlock Language
document_data.mainbody:
The '''grimlock language''' was the spoken language seemingly unique to [[grimlock]]s, a species of underground-dwelling [[humanoid]]s that isolated themselves from other races in the [[Underdark]]. It was technically a dialect of two other languages common among subterranean beings, [[Terran]] and [[Undercommon]].

The parent languages of the grimlock dialect were commonly spoken throughout [[Fingerhome]], an expansive series of caves the grimlock race regarded as their home.
